post_text:
A case of molestation of a foreign tourist woman has come to light in Jaipur, Rajasthan. Delhi Commission for Women (DCW) chief Swati Maliwal shared the video on Twitter, demanding action against the accused. He sent the video to Chief Minister Ashok Gehlot and the Rajasthan Police and demanded immediate attention to the matter.

Police started the investigation after the video went viral, although the incident location is unknown. Sindhi Camp police station has been given the instruction to investigate by the cityтАЩs municipal police control room.

As per the viral video, the accused can be seen repeatedly touching the female tourist. During this, the foreign woman looks very uncomfortable. The woman was accompanied by a male companion who found the behaviour of the accused a bit strange. The Delhi Commission for Women chief wrote on Twitter, тАЬJust saw this video where a man can be seen inappropriately touching a foreign tourist. This is so embarrassing. Tagging Ashok Gehlot and Rajasthan Police for action These incidents are spoiling the name of the country".

Source - News24

Follow @mewsinsta for trending news and informative carousel posts
#molestation #harassment #jaipur #mews

post_text:
Today is #internationalwomensday ЁЯСПЁЯСПЁЯСП

ЁЯСЙ The theme is #inspireinclusion and weтАЩve chosen to highlight some of the issues including discrimination, gender inequality and sexual harassment that we see as healthcare professionals ЁЯТЩ

ЁЯСЙ Equality is the goal ЁЯОп, and although progress has been made, sadly we are not close to that in the healthcare profession.

In 2021 the BMA found the following:

ЁЯСЙ 91% of female #doctors had experienced sexism in the past two years

ЁЯСЙ 60% of #nurses said they had experienced sexual harassment at work

ЁЯСЙ 56% of female doctors received unwanted verbal comments relating to their gender in the last two years

ЁЯМН ItтАЩs all our responsibility to lift the world that we live in to new standards.

ЁЯТн Collectively as individuals, groups, organisations and industries we can create a gender equal world. A world free of bias, stereotypes, and discrimination.

ЁЯМН A world thatтАЩs diverse, equitable, and inclusive. A world where difference is valued and celebrated. Together we can forge womenтАЩs equality. ЁЯСП

Equality is the goal and equity is the ticket to get there - not just for today but always. ЁЯЩМ

ЁЯТЩ Collectively itтАЩs all our responsibility to raise the standard. ЁЯТЩ

Please consider downloading The Student Dose Podcast Tackling Sexism with @scrubsurvivors - available on all major streaming platforms ЁЯТЩ

#werewithyou #iwd #iwd2024 #equality #equity #harassment #genderdiscimination #genderequality #doctors #doctorsofintagram #genderbias #youokaydoc #youokaynurse #nhsworkers #nhs #inclusiveemployment

ЁЯСПЁЯСП a greatly important topic! Happy international womenтАЩs day everyone!

Teach TEACHER! тЬия╕П

In Nigeria, we have Pidgin English which is a combination of Igbo, Yoruba, Hausa, English, French and several other languages. It's heavily influenced by the region where you are. Like when I schooled 4 hours away from home, their version is heavily influenced by the Bini language. For example, you can say something "una sabi who get that ride" = do you know who owns that car? Una is borrowed from Igbo. Sabi is borrowed from Yoruba.
IтАЩm going to try and work тАЬlinguistic imperialismтАЭ into my work conversations this week.
I learn something new from every post! Thank you!

WOW. So Manglish (Malaysian English) & Singlish (Singaporean English) is a form of English-based creole. ThereтАЩs a restaurant in London called Roti King and on the wall is this big sentence тАЬWei macha, you want to makan here or tapau?тАЭ In this sentence is a mix of Chinese, English, Tamil, and Malay and for a native it makes complete sense. ЁЯдп My mind is blown.
ThereтАЩs also Martiniquan creole

post_text:
New York City settles a $17.5 million lawsuit with Jamilla Clark and Arwa Aziz, two Muslim-American women who alleged police harassment. тБа
тБа
The settlement, approved by District Judge Analisa Torres, includes reforms regarding the removal of religious attire during police procedures. тБа
тБа
Estimated payouts for eligible claimants range from $7,824 to $13,125. тБа
тБа
The lawsuit, filed in 2018, stemmed from the women's claim of feeling shamed and violated when officers forced them to remove their hijabs for mugshots after arrest.

post_text:
Algerian boxer Imane Khelif won gold at this yearтАЩs Paris Olympics when she beat ChinaтАЩs Yang Liu in the womenтАЩs welterweight final.

Throughout this yearтАЩs Games, Khelif was at the centre of a vicious dispute about her gender eligibility. Despite being born female, not identifying as transgender or intersex and having the International Olympic Committee asserting her biological gender as female, she was subjected to a wave of online abuse.

Now the boxer is filing a cyberbullying lawsuit. In a statement sent to Variety, the Paris Prosecutor's Office said it will be conducting an investigation into the counts of тАЬcyber harassment due to gender, public insult because of gender, public incitement to discrimination and public insult because of origin.тАЭ

In the lawsuit J.K Rowling and Elon Musk have both been named over alleged тАЬacts of aggravated cyber harassmentтАЭ. Musk and Rowling were heavily involved in the discourse around KhelifтАЩs gender. In one post, Rowling shared a picture of Khelif accusing her of being a man who was тАЬenjoying the distress of a woman heтАЩs just punched in the head.тАЭ Musk, meanwhile, shared a post from swimmer Riley Gaines that claimed тАЬmen donтАЩt belong in womenтАЩs sports.тАЭ and quoted the message by writing: тАЬAbsolutely.тАЭ

While the lawsuit mentions these famous figures, it is actually filed against X, which under French law means it was filed against unknown persons, meaning anyone who may have written hateful messages can be investigated. This means that Donald Trump could also be investigated, as he took to X posting a picture from KhelifтАЩs first fight saying тАЬI will keep men out of womenтАЩs sports!тАЭ

Whilst JoanneтАЩs fantasy has helped to free people in the past, continuing to support it, despite you now being free and despite knowing what she is, means you become the oppressor of so many others. Others who, thanks to her, will never know the freedom you feel today.

#BriannaGhey #Transphobia #Hate #TransWomen #TransRights #EqualityAct #Discrimination #Harassment #Victimisation #BeTheChange #StopFundingHate

post_text:
Social activist and former wife of Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) leader Imran Khan, Jemima Khan, has disclosed that she has blocked all emails from Pakistan due to a wave of cyber-harassment.

Jemima announced this on her Instagram and X (formerly Twitter) accounts, linking the harassment to critics of Imran Khan.

In her message, she explained, тАЬTo friends in Pakistan trying to reach me, IтАЩve had to block all emails from Pakistan due to a cyber harassment campaign, most likely driven by PTIтАЩs desperate rivals.
